title: settings
description: JSON schema for the configuration of query-overview
overview:
The most straightforward way to customize query-overview is by using a configuration object whose properties describe the behavior and appearance of the chart. Since query-overview is a Webcharts `chart` object, many default Webcharts settings are set in the [defaultSettings.js file](https://github.com/RhoInc/query-overview/blob/master/src/defaultSettings.js) as [described below](#webcharts-settings). Refer to the [Webcharts documentation](https://github.com/RhoInc/Webcharts/wiki/Chart-Configuration) for more details on these settings.
In addition to the standard Webcharts settings several custom settings not available in the base Webcharts library have been added to query-overview to facilitate data mapping and other custom functionality. These custom settings are described in detail below. All defaults can be overwritten by users.
data-guidelines: The Query Overview accepts [JSON](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JSON) data of the format returned by [`d3.csv()`](https://github.com/d3/d3-3.x-api-reference/blob/master/CSV.md). The renderer visualizes clinical query data with **one row per query** plus the required variables specified below.

color_by_col.title: Status Group Variable
color_by_col.description: coloring variable name of query categorization: query age, query status, or any custom categorication

age_statuses.title: Query Statuses Applicable to Query Age
age_statuses.description: an array of query statuses for which query age will be derived

age_col.title: Query Age
age_col.description: query age variable measured in days between query open date and data snapshot date

age_cutoffs.title: Query Age Cutoffs
age_cutoffs.description: an array of query age cutoffs for which query age range will be derived

items.title: Query Age
items.description: query age measured in days between query open date and data snapshot date

age_range_colors.title: Query Age Range Colors
age_range_colors.description: an array of colors with which to color query age range categories; only as many colors as there are query age range categories will be used, from darkest to lightest

status_order.title: Query Status Order
status_order.description: an array of query statuses that dictates how they are ordered in the legend and chart

status_colors.title: Query Status Color
status_colors.description: an array of colors that determines the colors for query statuses

recency_category_col.title: Query Recency Category
recency_category_col.description: query recency category variable name; overrides recency_col

recency_col.title: Query Recency
recency_col.description: query recency variable measured in days between query open date and data snapshot date

recency_cutoffs.title: Query Recency Cutoffs
recency_cutoffs.description: an array of query recency cutoffs for which query recency range will be derived

items.title: Query Recency
items.description: query recency measured in days between query open date and data snapshot date or today...?

groups.title: Group-by Variables
groups.description: an array of variables by which to count queries; each value of the variable is plotted on the y-axis

status_groups.title: Stratification Variables
status_groups.description: an array of variables with which to stratify each group-by value, each value of which plots as a component of a stacked bar when Bar Arrangement is set to _Stacked_ or as individual bars when Bar Arrangement is set to _grouped_

filters.title: Filter Variables
filters.description: an array of variables with which to filter the data

dropdown_size.title: Number of Options Display in Multi-select Dropdowns
dropdown_size.description: controls the maximum number of options that appear in the multi-select dropdowns before a scrollbar appears

details.title: Detail Listing Variables
details.description: an array of variables which will print in the listing; if unspecified all variables in data will appear in listing

bar_arrangement.title: Arrangement of Bars
bar_arrangement.description: controls arrangement of bars, either stacked or grouped side-by-side

cutoff.title: Number of Groups Displayed Initially
cutoff.description: a value that limits the number of groups displayed on the y-axis

alphabetize.title: Display Groups Alphanumerically?
alphabetize.description: sort groups on the y-axis alphanumerically; by default groups are sorted by descending frequency

truncate_listing_cells.title: Truncate Listing Cell Text?
truncate_listing_cells.description: optionally truncate cell text past a certain number of characters

truncation_cutoff.title: Maximum Length of Cell Text
truncation_cutoff.description: cell text past this cutoff will be truncated and the full text will be captured in a tooltip
